title: Vegaritos
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican
description: Vegan burritos and burrito bowls eatery, opened Dec 2015 by the owners of Evolve and Everlasting Life restaurants. Location is 1 block from the Takoma Metro station on the red line. On the menu are vegan steak and chicken, black and red beans, brown rice, Daiya cheese, guacamole, vegan sour cream, etc.. Food is served in take-out ware.
